text: Hi! How are you today?
I'm great. How about yourself?
I'm doing great, thanks. Do you donate at all?
I do donate sometimes, yes.
that's great, have you ever donated to save the children?
I have donated a couple of times; like for the St Jude's Hospital, red nose day and March of Dimes.I do what I can to give back.
That is really great. I know how hard it can be to give, but it's amazing how a small amount can make such a big difference
That is very true. If more people gave, even it's a small amount, it truly adds up and can make a difference.
You are very right. And the children are the ones who need it the most!
Absolutely, they are the future generation and it's imperative that they are nurtured and looked after.
I completely agree! And save the children really focuses on ensuring the children get the money that is donated
That's great. Could you tell me more about this charity?
It is an organization that helps children from all over the world, such as the millilns of syrian children living through war
Sounds amazing. How are the proceeds distributed?
they are credible and ensure the money they get goes to the children
How would you go about donating to this cause?
You can go to the website  URL
Awesome, I'll head over there right now and support it thank you.
great! how much do uou want to donate today?
I can donate a dollar for now since I don't have much right but I feel obligated to at least donate something.
